Короче это помойка с большим количеством читеров и школьников с микрофонами за 300 рублей, которые говорят где видели твою маму. Никому не советую, так как это ебучая нервотрепка в которой тебе надо сидеть днями на пролет чтобы поднять звание, а потом ты пойдешь на фейсит и уже там тебя будут по настоящему ебать в твою детскую попку. Одной фразой: "Aхуенная игра, если у тебя много свободного времени"!

Recomendo esse jogo para todos aqueles que não se importam com a sua sanidade mental, já que a valve não faz absolutamente nada para resolver os problemas de cheats do jogo. Se você é aquele player que já apanhou tanto da vida que está extasiado para tudo que vier, esse jogo é pra você. Ou simplesmente se você é sadomasoquista esse jogo também é para você, porque uma coisa é certa, raiva você vai passar

Really very nice and interesting game in the variations it offers inside. The mechanics are just as interesting and better than many other games. A positive thing in the game, besides the fact that it's Free To Play, is the ability to receive drops after the game ends (which is tempting to play, but only available to prime users). Personally I recommend trying it at least once as in my opinion it is one of the best fps on the market.
i would recommend this game if you play something like faceit or ESEA but matchmaking i would not recommend because it is plugged with cheaters and boosters
It is a game for the action lovers and they will enjoy much who like firing shots and love weapons..
